comments.creator: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Hey folks!

I've completed a first draft of the [c# bindings design document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kXabsuqtBYcRRoRJSy9OI99xb1ZcSjqmM6r-RT1RpOM/edit#).

Let me know what you think and if it's ok to move forward with that design, or if you have any **major** concern.
